details: The only Nobu in Africa. Embark on an unforgettable journey of gourmet excellence, fresh creations and masterful Japanese-Peruvian cuisine with Nobu Cape Town.
We are well known for our great value for money and extremely reasonable fresh sushi specials with excellent service.
Willoughby & Co offers its clientele a full Japanese kitchen, ranging from the freshest sushi to tempura dishes, oyster shooters to soups and salads.
Inspired by the Traditional Craftsmanship of Japan, We Offer Great Quality Sushi at an Affordable Price. Delicious Seafood, Classic to Gourmet Sushi.
